overview:
* Partner: SEED Capital Management I/S
* Managing Director Symbion Capital I A/S
*
  Member of the Board: Fullrate A/S, Noise Limit A/S, 3D Facto ApS., ESnation A/S, watAgame.

Career:

Lars is a serial entrepreneur with several successful exits to his name. He has more than 15 years experience in the Danish and international ICT industry, providing him with insight and network contacts that are essential to his daily decisions as a partner in SEED Capital.

Lars’ domain areas include internationalization, sales, and management.

Previously, Lars was the co-founder and CEO of Columbus IT Partner A/S, with international responsibility for more than 1000 employees in 25 countries, as well as being responsible for the companyâ€™s IPO on the Copenhagen stock exchange in 1998. Since Columbus IT Partner, Lars has co-founded five other IT companies, and today is an enthusiastic and dedicated shareholder and board member. His latest achievement was the international exit of Audio Asics.

Lars has an MSc in marketing and management from Aarhus School of Economics.
